name: Classic Pizza
description: Delicious and cheesy pizza topped with your favorite ingredients.

name: Pepperoni Paradise Pizza
description: Savor the flavor of pepperoni on a bed of melted mozzarella.

name: Veggie Delight Pizza
description: A garden-fresh pizza loaded with colorful veggies and cheese.

name: Double Cheeseburger
description: Double the delight with this juicy double cheeseburger.

name: Spicy Chicken Burger
description: A zesty chicken burger with a kick of spice.

name: Mushroom Swiss Burger
description: Savor the rich flavors of mushrooms and melted Swiss cheese.

name: Dragon Roll
description: Experience the bold flavors of eel and avocado in this sushi roll.

name: Seafood Alfredo Pasta
description: Indulge in a creamy seafood Alfredo pasta with a medley of flavors.

name: Carnitas Tacos
description: Succulent carnitas tacos with fresh salsa and guacamole.

name: Dragon Nigiri
description: A sushi nigiri inspired by the mythical dragon, featuring eel and avocado.

name: Meat Lover's Pizza
description: A carnivore's delight with a variety of meats on a pizza.

name: BBQ Chicken Pizza
description: Enjoy the smoky flavors of BBQ chicken on a crispy pizza crust.

name: Vegan Burger
description: A plant-based burger with all the savory goodness, perfect for vegans.

name: Caprese Salad
description: A refreshing salad with tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil drizzled with balsamic glaze.

name: Shrimp Tacos
description: Delight in the flavors of shrimp tacos with a zesty lime dressing.

name: Rainbow Roll
description: A colorful and flavorful sushi roll featuring a variety of fresh fish.

name: Margarita Pizza
description: Simplicity at its best with a classic Margarita pizza.

name: Blue Cheese Bacon Burger
description: Indulge in the bold flavors of blue cheese and crispy bacon on a burger.

name: Pesto Chicken Pasta
description: Pasta perfection with pesto-marinated chicken and pine nuts.

description: Spicy chorizo tacos with a kick of flavor and topped with fresh cilantro.

name: Volcano Roll
description: Experience an explosion of flavors with the volcano roll, featuring spicy tuna.

name: Pineapple Ham Pizza
description: A tropical twist on pizza with sweet pineapple and savory ham.

name: Portobello Mushroom Burger

name: Truffle Fettuccine Alfredo
description: Indulge in the luxurious flavors of truffle-infused fettuccine Alfredo.

name: Street Corn Tacos

name: Rigatoni Bolognese
description: Hearty rigatoni pasta with a rich and savory Bolognese sauce.

name: Ceviche Tostadas
description: Fresh and tangy ceviche on crisp tostadas for a delightful appetizer.
